pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shrinkage t Statistic and Correlation-Adjusted t-Score // Implements the "shrinkage t" statistic introduced in Opgen- Rhein and Strimmer (2007) DOI:10.2202/1544-6115.1252 and a shrinkage estimate of the "correlation-adjusted t-score" (CAT score) described in Zuber and Strimmer (2009) DOI:10.1093/bioinformatics/btp460. It also offers a convenient interface to a number of other regularized t-statistics commonly employed in high-dimensional case-control studies.
